tech_news.title: Are Fallout remakes dropping soon? The answer is no, sorry. - Windows Central
tech_news.description: Rumors are swirling about the future of Fallout, and I'm here to crush your dreams. Fallout 3 and New Vegas remakes / remasters are not launching imminently.

tech_news.title: System76 Continues Driving More Improvements Into The COSMIC Desktop - Phoronix
tech_news.description: Following the December launch of Pop!_OS 24.04 LTS and the first major COSMIC desktop release, System76 software engineers have continued making improvements to their Rust-based desktop environment.

tech_news.title: Samsung’s discounted microSD Express card more than doubles your Switch 2 storage - The Verge
tech_news.description: Samsung’s P9 microSD Express card starts at $39.99 ($15 off) at Amazon, while the 512GB model is $79.99 ($40 off) — just $5 shy of its best price to date.

tech_news.title: CD Projekt Hits Paid Cyberpunk 2077 VR Mod With DMCA Strike, Creator Refuses Request to Make It Free for Everyone - IGN
tech_news.description: CD Projekt has confirmed it issued a DMCA strike on a paid Cyberpunk 2077 VR mod, after its creator refused to make it free for everyone upon the studio’s request.
